metadata.description: A non-stop Steampunk thrill ride featuring giant robots and set in Victorian London. London, 1899.  A series of mysterious deaths on the shipping docks have an ex-Scotland Yard officer on the hunt for clues.  What he uncovers is a war between a huge corporation and a renegade group of individuals, with both parties fighting for a powerful new energy source. A cross-Atlantic collaboration between American authors Jason Henderson and Tony Salvaggio, and French illustrator Jean-Baptiste Hostache.
metadata.name: Clockwerx
